turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Window screen.
turn.1: how many inches is a standard window screen
turn.2: For comparison, a typical screen in a clothes dryer has a nylon 23x23 mesh screen.
turn.3: does the screen have to be replaced often
turn.4: Fiberglass solar screens provide over 75% of UV protection, by using thicker strands and a closer mesh than regular 18x14 fiberglass window screening.
turn.6: There is some reduction in visibility, but this can be advantageous, since solar screens are difficult to see through from the outside, while easier to see through from the inside.
turn.7: does the screen stop all insects
turn.8: Finer meshes have been developed to prevent very small insects, often called "noseeums" from flying through.
turn.9: do the screens stop anything else
turn.10: The finer mesh screens are also used to prevent pollens and allergens from entering homes in order to control allergic reactions.
